thread.title: Robert Fettig
thread.title_full: POP Yachts reviewed by Robert Fettig

author: Robert Fettig
title: Robert Fettig
text: The sale was a delightful experence, Jessica Smith in the closing department made my wife and I comfortable with all the documentation and the ease of the whole process. Our broker, Andy Baker was excellent, very knowledgeable, hard working and was always available. We are more than comfortable using Andy to help us find our next dream. Thank you to POP Yatchs and Staff
